title: Instructional Design Based on Learning Research to Strengthen Small-Group Learning and Teacher Knowledge Sharing

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration and feedback system support using VR environments, with LMS-based learning material management.

learning_goals: Instructional strategies for decimal numbers can be designed by applying the Learning Study methodology
A knowledge-sharing process among teachers is implemented in VR simulation environments, improving learning effectiveness by over 20%
Customized instructional approaches for different learner types can be proposed by analyzing peer teachers' classroom observation data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
